description: Main API module for notes backend using FastAPI. Defines endpoints for CRUD operations on notes, loads environment configurations, and configures middleware.

classes.name: None
classes.description: This file does not define additional classes; it mainly sets up FastAPI app and routes.

methods.name: health_check()
methods.description: Health check endpoint to verify service availability.

methods.name: list_notes()
methods.description: Returns a list of all stored notes.

methods.name: get_note( note_id: int = Path(..., description="The ID of the note to retrieve") )
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by ID.

methods.name: create_note(note_in: NoteCreate)
methods.description: Creates a new note based on provided data.

methods.name: update_note( note_id: int = Path(..., description="The ID of the note to update"), note_in: NoteUpdate = ..., )
methods.description: Updates an existing note by ID.

methods.name: delete_note( note_id: int = Path(..., description="The ID of the note to delete") )

ctags.name: delete_note
ctags.signature: ( note_id: int = Path(..., description="The ID of the note to delete") )

ctags.name: get_note
ctags.signature: ( note_id: int = Path(..., description="The ID of the note to retrieve") )

ctags.name: update_note
ctags.signature: ( note_id: int = Path(..., description="The ID of the note to update"), note_in: NoteUpdate = ..., )
